trans-unit.source: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using ARM templates | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using ARM templates | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create clusters for Azure HDInsight using Azure ARM templates.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create clusters for Azure HDInsight using Azure ARM templates.

trans-unit.source: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using ARM templates
trans-unit.target: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using ARM templates

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters using Azure Resource Manager(ARM) templates.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters using Azure Resource Manager(ARM) templates.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Deploy an application with Azure Resource Manager template](../resource-group-template-deploy.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Deploy an application with Azure Resource Manager template](../resource-group-template-deploy.md).

trans-unit.source: For other cluster creation tools and features click the tab select on the top of this page or see [Cluster creation methods](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#cluster-creation-methods).
trans-unit.target: For other cluster creation tools and features click the tab select on the top of this page or see [Cluster creation methods](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#cluster-creation-methods).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites:

trans-unit.source: Before you begin the instructions in this article, you must have the following:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin the instructions in this article, you must have the following:

trans-unit.source: [Azure subscription](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: [Azure subscription](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: [Azure PowerShell](hdinsight-administer-use-powershell.md#install-azure-powershell-10-and-greater) and/or [Azure CLI](../xplat-cli-install.md).
trans-unit.target: [Azure PowerShell](hdinsight-administer-use-powershell.md#install-azure-powershell-10-and-greater) and/or [Azure CLI](../xplat-cli-install.md).

trans-unit.source: ARM templates
trans-unit.target: ARM templates

trans-unit.source: ARM template makes it easy to create HDInsight clusters, their dependent resources (such as the default storage account), and other resources (such as Azure SQL Database to use Apache Sqoop) for your application in a single, coordinated operation.
trans-unit.target: ARM template makes it easy to create HDInsight clusters, their dependent resources (such as the default storage account), and other resources (such as Azure SQL Database to use Apache Sqoop) for your application in a single, coordinated operation.

trans-unit.source: In the template, you define the resources that are needed for the application and specify deployment parameters to input values for different environments.
trans-unit.target: In the template, you define the resources that are needed for the application and specify deployment parameters to input values for different environments.

trans-unit.source: The template consists of JSON and expressions which you can use to construct values for your deployment.
trans-unit.target: The template consists of JSON and expressions which you can use to construct values for your deployment.

trans-unit.source: An ARM template for creating an HDInsight cluster and the dependent Azure Storage account can be found in [Appendix-A]().
trans-unit.target: An ARM template for creating an HDInsight cluster and the dependent Azure Storage account can be found in [Appendix-A]().

trans-unit.source: Use a text editor to save the template into a file on your workstation.
trans-unit.target: Use a text editor to save the template into a file on your workstation.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to call the template using various tools.
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to call the template using various tools.

trans-unit.source: For more information about ARM template, see
trans-unit.target: For more information about ARM template, see

trans-unit.source: [Author Azure Resource Manager templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md)
trans-unit.target: [Author Azure Resource Manager templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md)

trans-unit.source: [Deploy an application with Azure Resource Manager template](../resource-group-template-deploy.md)
trans-unit.target: [Deploy an application with Azure Resource Manager template](../resource-group-template-deploy.md)

trans-unit.source: Deploy with PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Deploy with PowerShell

trans-unit.source: The following procedure creates Linux-based HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The following procedure creates Linux-based HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: **To deploy a cluster using ARM template**
trans-unit.target: **To deploy a cluster using ARM template**

trans-unit.source: Save the json file in [Appendix A](#appx-a-arm-template) to your workstation.
trans-unit.target: Save the json file in [Appendix A](#appx-a-arm-template) to your workstation.

trans-unit.source: Set the parameters if needed.
trans-unit.target: Set the parameters if needed.

trans-unit.source: Run the template using the following PowerShell script:
trans-unit.target: Run the template using the following PowerShell script:

trans-unit.source: The PowerShell script only configures the cluster name and the storage account name.
trans-unit.target: The PowerShell script only configures the cluster name and the storage account name.

trans-unit.source: You can set other values in the ARM template.
trans-unit.target: You can set other values in the ARM template.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Deploy with PowerShell](../resource-group-template-deploy.md#deploy-with-powershell).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Deploy with PowerShell](../resource-group-template-deploy.md#deploy-with-powershell).

trans-unit.source: Deploy with REST API
trans-unit.target: Deploy with REST API

trans-unit.source: See [Deploy with the REST API](../resource-group-template-deploy.md#deploy-with-the-rest-api).
trans-unit.target: See [Deploy with the REST API](../resource-group-template-deploy.md#deploy-with-the-rest-api).

trans-unit.source: Deploy with Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Deploy with Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: With Visual Studio, you can create a resource group project and deploy it to Azure through the user interface.
trans-unit.target: With Visual Studio, you can create a resource group project and deploy it to Azure through the user interface.

trans-unit.source: You select the type of resources to include in your project and those resources are automatically added to Resource Manager template.
trans-unit.target: You select the type of resources to include in your project and those resources are automatically added to Resource Manager template.

trans-unit.source: The project also provides a PowerShell script to deploy the template.
trans-unit.target: The project also provides a PowerShell script to deploy the template.

trans-unit.source: For an introduction to using Visual Studio with resource groups, see [Creating and deploying Azure resource groups through Visual Studio](../vs-azure-tools-resource-groups-deployment-projects-create-deploy.md).
trans-unit.target: For an introduction to using Visual Studio with resource groups, see [Creating and deploying Azure resource groups through Visual Studio](../vs-azure-tools-resource-groups-deployment-projects-create-deploy.md).
